items.sentence: It's all your fault that I'm in a wheelchair now.
I had to pay a large sum of money to get it back.
I sent Tom an e-mail, asking him what he thought.
Did you buy the house you said you wanted to buy?
The doctor advised me that I should go on a diet.
There are leftovers from yesterday in the fridge.
Tom should've complained, but he just kept quiet.
Is there something else you'd like me to get you?
Tom grows many kinds of vegetables in his garden.
Unfortunately, we didn't visit Tom when we could.
